import React from 'react'; import './PaymentSuccess.css'; const PaymentSuccess = ({ bookingId, selectedRoute, selectedSeats, onGoHome }) => { const totalAmount = selectedSeats.length * 150; return (
‚úì

); }; export default PaymentSuccess;
